name: President House Construction Simulator
description:
Enjoy the most entertaining and unique President House Construction Simulator game till now. Get ready to drive heavy construction machinery and excavators to build white house for USA President. As the game progress you will find challenging levels of house construct. Be a contractor of this US president house game and build a sophisticated white house. Construction trucks and cranes are given to finish the task in the best possible way. Download and play the most creative game of 2018 with addictive home design feature. 

Design a brand new house for American president as previous was too old. There are number of steps for construction which you have to follow. They comprise 10 different levels. First of all clear the land from stone and level the surface. Use excavator, bulldozers and loading trucks for house building. After completing this, next task is to load construction material in loader truck and take it to the construction site. Drive carefully and supply all required material on time. Use road roller to plain the surface for US president house construct. Now place pillars on he pointed area using tower crane. Realistic physics used like in our other construction games. Build boundary walls and complete all construction tasks of this house builder simulator. Your job as almost done as an architect, now clear the road and clean the area using road cleaners. Cut gross with cutter and plant trees to add beauty in white house. 

President House Construction Simulator Features:
• White House Building Simulation for androids
• Realistic construction site environment and High quality graphics
• 10 exciting levels with challenging tasks
• Heavy cranes, excavators and truck driving simulator
• Free to download and easy to play

So what are you waiting for? Download President House Construction Simulator game now and enjoy work as a civil engineer. Do rate and review it for further updates.
